description:
Whether you’re trying to make your work life more professional or your social life more private, a second phone line can be a great solution. Now new users can get one for only $20 through Hushed, which is offering $5 off their secure lifetime plans with a special Memorial Day coupon.

title: Take $5 off a lifetime plan for a second, secure phone line

description:

title: Save $250 to add ChatGPT to your WordPress
